Get Project

Source: R/get_project.R
get_project.Rd

Get Project

get_project(url, debug = TRUE)

Arguments

url

url of KWB project
debug

print debug messages (default: TRUE)

Value

tibble with project infos

Examples

url <- "https://www.kompetenz-wasser.de/en/project/flusshygiene/"
project_info <- get_project(url)
#> [1] "https://www.kompetenz-wasser.de/en/project/flusshygiene/"
#> Warning: All formats failed to parse. No formats found.
str(project_info)
